PasswordRuleDefn.Name: PWD_LENGTH
PasswordRuleDefn.ParamDefn: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <ParamList> <Param DataType="Number" Description="Minimum length of password" Name="MinLength"/> <Param DataType="Number" Description="Maximum length of password" Name="MaxLength"/> </ParamList>

PasswordRuleDefn.Description: To validate old passwords are not used
PasswordRuleDefn.Name: PWD_HIST_CHECK
PasswordRuleDefn.ParamDefn: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <ParamList> <Param DataType="Number" Description="Number of old passwords to store and validate against" Name="EntriesToStore"/> </ParamList>

PasswordRuleDefn.Description: To validate that password contains special characters
PasswordRuleDefn.Name: PWD_REQUIRE_SPL_CHAR

PasswordRuleDefn.Description: To change the password on next login attempt
PasswordRuleDefn.Name: PWD_FIRST_ATTEMPT

PasswordRuleDefn.Description: Expire password after certain number of days
PasswordRuleDefn.Name: PWD_EXPIRATION_CHECK
PasswordRuleDefn.ParamDefn: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <ParamList> <Param DataType="Number" Description="Number of days a password is valid for" Name="NumDaysValid"/> </ParamList>

PasswordRuleDefn.Description: Temporarily disable a user account after a certain number of failed login attempts
PasswordRuleDefn.Name: FAILED_LOGIN_CHECK
PasswordRuleDefn.ParamDefn: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <ParamList> <Param DataType="Number" Description="Number of times password can be entered incorrectly within the given check minutes" Name="MaxFailedLogins"/> <Param DataType="Number" Description="Ignore failed attempts before this threshold" Name="CheckIntervalMinutes"/> </ParamList>

PasswordRuleDefn.Description: Temporarily disable a given IP address after a certain number of failed login attempts
PasswordRuleDefn.Name: FAILED_LOGIN_IP_CHECK
PasswordRuleDefn.ParamDefn: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <ParamList> <Param DataType="Number" Description="Number of times the password can be entered incorrectly within the given CheckInterval" Name="MaxFailedLogins"/> <Param DataType="Number" Description="Ignore failed attempts before this threshold" Name="CheckIntervalMinutes"/> </ParamList>

PasswordRuleDefn.Description: Temporarily disable a user account after a certain number of failed answer attempts
PasswordRuleDefn.Name: FAILED_ANSWER_CHECK
PasswordRuleDefn.ParamDefn: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <ParamList> <Param DataType="Number" Description="Number of times the answer can be entered incorrectly within the given CheckInterval" Name="MaxFailedAnswers"/> <Param DataType="Number" Description="Ignore failed attempts before this threshold" Name="CheckIntervalMinutes"/> </ParamList>

PasswordRuleDefn.Description: Temporarily disable a user account after a certain number of failed answer attempts
PasswordRuleDefn.Name: FAILED_ANSWER_IP_CHECK
PasswordRuleDefn.ParamDefn: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <ParamList> <Param DataType="Number" Description="Number of times the answer can be entered incorrectly within the given CheckInterval" Name="MaxFailedAnswers"/> <Param DataType="Number" Description="Ignore failed attempts before this threshold" Name="CheckIntervalMinutes"/> </ParamList>

PasswordRuleDefn.Name: ALLOW_PASSWORD_RESET_EMAIL
PasswordRuleDefn.ParamDefn: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <ParamList> <Param DataType="String" Description="Allowed modes of password reset" Name="ResetType"/> <Param DataType="Number" Description="Ignore failed attempts before this threshold. " Name="CheckIntervalMinutes"/> </ParamList>
